TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InstalledFontCollection extends System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection
Public NotInheritable Class InstalledFontCollection Inherits FontCollection
public ref class InstalledFontCollection sealed : System::Drawing::Text::FontCollection

summary.span: 表示系統上所安裝的字型。

span.span: Represents the fonts installed on the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您取得所執行的應用程式的電腦上安裝的字型家族清單及其屬性。The allows you to get a list of fonts families that are installed on the computer running the application with its property. 如需有關字型和文字，包括範例程式碼，請參閱[使用字型和文字](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-fonts-and-text.md)。For additional information on fonts and text, including example code, see [Using Fonts and Text](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-fonts-and-text.md). 請勿使用類別來安裝 windows 的字型。Do not use the class to install a font to Windows. 改用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]`AddFontResource`函式。Instead use the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `AddFontResource` function. 物件會看見的物件建立之前安裝在 Windows 中的字型。An object sees only fonts that are installed in Windows before the object is created. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得支援一般的字型清單的。The following example shows how to get a list of fonts that support the regular . 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc3#InstalledFonts](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/CS/Form1.cs#installedfonts)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc3#InstalledFonts](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/VB/Form1.vb#installedfonts)]
